detail: Summary mentions the Swedish Captain ('a young, morose Swede who mentions that a fellow Swede hanged himself') but chars array does not include SWEDISH_CAPTAIN.

Description at P1-09 drops the key fact that Kurtz sends in more ivory than all the other agents combined, established at P1-06. The ivory-sending reputation is his most defining trait at this point.

Description at P3-01 drops the colourful patched clothes and Russian-from-Tambov backstory established at P2-07. Later description focuses on discipleship but loses the vivid physical and biographical details.
Description at P3-08 drops the fact that her family disapproved of the engagement, established at P3-07.

PILGRIMS appear in 7 scenes (P2-02, P2-04, P2-05, P2-06, P2-07, P3-02, P3-05) but have only 1 description entry (at P2-02). They probably need at least one progression description covering their role in the attack and departure scenes.
